Articles.Content: I just found out I can view the forums on my kindle! There shall be no more reading on this! I feel weird now because nobody probably cares about this.
You can view the forums on almost anything with an internet browser. I'm not sure if some old DOS, C64, or Amiga machine would work, though.

You can view the forums on almost anything with an internet browser. I'm not sure if some old DOS, C64, or Amiga machine would work, though.

Im pretty sure it would actually. not pretty but it would, after all just look at these forums, not the most complex in the looks department is it.
I was saying this because I did not know my Kindle had a browser. It would be cool to see the forums on an old Windows OS.

Im pretty sure it would actually. not pretty but it would, after all just look at these forums, not the most complex in the looks department is it.

Nope, this forum has Javascript and CSS in it. C64 and Amiga are both way before those standards. Some of the later versions of DOS might've had the capability to have Java on them, but I'm not so sure.
